title: [K-12] Interactive Multimedia-based Beginner Language Learning Course

context.additional_context: A group learning environment conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology setting. Smart devices are usable within classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can use 30 daily expressions (greetings, ordering, asking directions, etc.) with 80% accuracy
Learners can apply basic grammatical structures with over 70% accuracy through interactive quizzes and role-playing
Learners can improve pronunciation accuracy by 60% through speech recognition-based assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
